name: Maximum Groove
description:
Made for Mini Jam 107.

Due to the amount of physics objects used in this game, it can run slowly in a browser.  If you're experiencing slowdown or audio issues, please download the desktop version.

If audio doesn't immediately start playing, or tracks are overlapping, please refresh the page, allow browser cookies, or download the desktop version.  This problem sometimes occurs in the web version, and isn't present in the desktop version.

Firefox can have issues with audio looping.  If you're using Firefox and the audio stops looping, please either download the desktop version or use a different browser.

Controls:

Left Click (hold) - Move towards cursor.

Right Click - Toggle gravity field.
